Sarah Hoskins is Head of Sustainability at Mannheimer Swartling. At the firm she coordinates our strategic sustainability work, internally as well as in support of clients externally. Sarah originally joined the firm in 2011 as a Senior Associate within the EU and Competition and Corporate Sustainability and Risk Management practice groups.

Sarah previously worked as Compliance Director at Sandvik Mining and Rock Solutions where she led the global team driving ethics and compliance within anti-corruption, data integrity, competition and trade, as well as management of the whistleblowing system. A key part of this role involved leveraging compliance and sustainability touchpoints to embed improvements in systems, strategy, learning and culture to meet Sandvik’s sustainability targets.
